title: Re: Despotic Martian King
content:
Viking lander;

Weight 576Kg

Size: 3x3x2m

Landing velocity: 23Km/h

Ergo if this vehicle was to kill the Garg despot by falling at the terminal velocity given [assuming Gargs have 1/6 of our resilience to pressure] then we would require a Garg of maximum dimensions of 4x4x4m, reasonably large.

Given that the lander took 360 degree photographs that did not show the kings remains, we must therefore assume [ignoring the negligible splatter radius] that the despot was about 90% of 3x3m in cross sectional area [when flattened] This works out as 2.7x2.7x2.9 [Garg height/width ratio, assuming average eyestalk length.]

The average Garg height is 1.56m [thankyou KeenRush] So our despot is just under doubble average height. [Perfectly attainable given martian gravity.]

A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
